General.Name: Peyto Exploration & Development Corp
General.Description: Peyto Exploration & Development Corp. engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and natural gas, and natural gas liquids in Deep Basin of Alberta. The company was formerly known as Peyto Energy Trust and changed its name to Peyto Exploration & Development Corp. in January 2011. Peyto Exploration & Development Corp. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 600 ? 3rd Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0G5
